oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from John W. Childress to Sarah Childress Polk about runaway slave
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This letter from John W. Childress to his sister Sarah Childress Polk reports on the status of runaway slave Mariah. He states that she always intended to return to Columbia because she desired to attend Matilda's Christmas frollick.
Sarah Childress Polk is the wife of President James K. Polk.
